name: Stuck Ducks
description:
In Stuck Ducks, you play as a Mallard who stumbles upon ducklings that mistake you for their mother. Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6, you must "Take Care" of these ducklings by guiding them and solving various puzzles. Move with the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys, fly with the UP arrow key, and quack! with the DOWN arrow key. You can press escape at any time to close the game (Note! progress is not saved).

The game also features a retro style 4 color MS-DOS palette like the ones you can find here: https://lospec.com/palette-list/tag/cga

Having trouble? Are you a stuck duck too? Here are some hints:

Hint #1. Ducklings do funny things if you stand by them quietly!

Hint #2. Quacking from a higher position encourages a duckling to jump.

Hint #3. Crowding ducklings in small spaces can be a headache.
